plot: Giant Fox and William Honda just wanted to have a nice coffee together, but the afternoon turns out more adventurous than expected.
title: An Adventurous Afternoon
plot_es: Giant Fox and William Honda just wanted to have a nice coffee together, but the afternoon turns out more adventurous than expected.
plot_en: Giant Fox and William Honda just wanted to have a nice coffee together, but the afternoon turns out more adventurous than expected.
